summary: This test module validates the Azure OpenAI integration by checking how custom HTTP headers and endpoint URLs are processed. It uses mock objects and pytest to ensure that header handling logic works correctly under various scenarios, including empty, partial, and full header sets, as well as extra headers and URL formatting.
business_intent: Guarantee that the Azure OpenAI client constructs requests with the correct headers and endpoint format, preventing misconfiguration and ensuring reliable communication with the Azure OpenAI service.
